performance_metrics.name: Inspection Speed (Parts/Hour)
performance_metrics.description: The number of parts inspected per hour. Dependent on board size, component density, and inspection algorithm complexity.

performance_metrics.name: Defect Detection Rate (Accuracy)
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of defects detected correctly out of all defects present.  This is typically measured across a statistically significant sample of parts (minimum 500 parts).

performance_metrics.name: False Positive Rate
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of non-defective parts incorrectly identified as defective. Should be minimized through optimized algorithms and filter settings.

performance_metrics.name: Cycle Time (Per Part)
performance_metrics.description: Time taken to inspect a single part, including image acquisition, processing, and defect classification.  Factors include board complexity and algorithm speed.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Parts/Shift)
performance_metrics.description: The total number of parts inspected during an 8-hour shift, considering cycle time and downtime.

performance_metrics.name: Defect Classification Accuracy (Category)
performance_metrics.description: Accuracy in classifying detected defects into predefined categories (e.g., cracks, scratches, missing components).

implementation_requirements.name: Board Size Support
implementation_requirements.description: The AOI system must accommodate a range of board sizes to meet production needs.

implementation_requirements.name: Camera Resolution
implementation_requirements.description: High-resolution cameras with sufficient dynamic range for accurate defect detection under varying lighting conditions.

implementation_requirements.name: Lighting System
implementation_requirements.specification: Diffuse LED Array, Adjustable Intensity (100 - 500 Lux)
implementation_requirements.description: Consistent, diffuse lighting is crucial for reliable defect detection. Adjustable intensity allows optimization for different board materials.

implementation_requirements.name: Image Processing Unit
implementation_requirements.specification: Multi-core Processor (Intel Xeon or equivalent), Minimum 16GB RAM
implementation_requirements.description: Powerful processing unit for real-time image analysis.

implementation_requirements.name: Software Platform
implementation_requirements.specification: Modular, configurable software with onboard programming capabilities
implementation_requirements.description: Allows for algorithm customization and adaptation to changing product requirements.

implementation_requirements.name: Data Connectivity
implementation_requirements.description: For data transfer to MES/ERP systems.

implementation_requirements.name: Maintenance Access
implementation_requirements.description: Facilitates rapid repair and preventative maintenance

industry_standards: ANSI/ASIE SEA 2000 (Standards for Automated Optical Inspection)
operational_considerations: Algorithm Optimization (continuous improvement based on defect data)
Preventative Maintenance Schedule (based on manufacturer recommendations)
Environmental Control (temperature, humidity) â€“ maintain within specified ranges for optimal sensor performance

input.system_message: You are an AI assistant specialized in industrial engineering and specifications. For the given topic, provide a comprehensive overview of industrial/commercial specifications including performance metrics and implementation requirements. Be precise with numerical values and include ranges where appropriate. Focus on practical technical details that would be relevant to professionals in the field.
input.user_message:
Create detailed industrial specifications for: Automated Optical Inspection (AOI)

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. performance_metrics: An array of metrics with names, values/ranges, and descriptions
2. implementation_requirements: An array of requirements with names, specifications, and descriptions
3. industry_standards: An array of relevant standards and certifications
4. key_suppliers: An array of major equipment/technology suppliers for this industry
5. operational_considerations: An array of important operational factors

Please provide realistic values for industrial/commercial scale implementations.

Return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
